title: Shadows
description: Selena Ryder's life takes an even darker turn two days before Halloween, when she realizes that Halloween's day might actually be the day she dies. With nothing but a mysterious book, and a shady Vampire who claims to be from her past to guide her, she has to take a trip down history, to a life lived centuries ago, in hopes of figuring out the truth. Will she succeed, or will she run out of time?
author: Robin Todd
